title: Ishvari jagadIshvari
sahitya:
Ishvari jagadIshvari mahEshvari krpAkari amba


anupallavi

  aishvarya pradAyini (sarva) amba munijana hrdaya nivAsini 
harSa bhASiNi sujana pOSiNi shUladhAriNi pApa mOcani


caraNam    kamanIyAkrtE giriputrE ramaNIya gEyE vanaspati priyE 
karuNA kalitE kOmala gAtrE muraLIgAna rasikE mAm pAhi
